info.description:
Custom-made Fabric
Exclusive to us, with a striking basket-weave effect. And in some of Allegra's signature shades - uplifting blue and aqua that still work well with neutrals.

Cocoon Comfort
With an elegant, wraparound design that looks really inviting and fits like a hug. The sit is well-supported, medium-firm and super comfy.

info.name: Lulu Scoop Chair in honeycomb weave
